message: I *may* have requested that group's topics during the same 'session' which may have influenced things...
late last night I saw a few topic creation events in my live stream for groups that I don't belong to

so the question is: is this a bug or some hidden (cool) feature where if I ask for a group's topics I'll temporarily get topic-level events for that group? If so, is that true for messages inside topics too?
@ericflo - this may be intertwined with the issue I saw a few days back where people were complaining of unread counters they couldn't clear.
